short: I have been a software developer for 3 years. I help companies build and improve the performance of their web apps.
long: I am a software developer with 3 years working experience with JavaScript, Ruby on Rails and React, I help companies build and improve the performance of their web apps. In the last 2 years, I have worked with two companies as a front-end developer to build dashboards that has thousands of users. My strength is building beautiful, scalable and performant web apps.
